review_reason: Omega-squared construction (plan v012 Phase 3) has a mathematical gap: F-formula persistence through Lindenbaum extensions is not provable at any level of chain nesting, including within the omega-squared inner chain. The FPreservingSeed alternative is provably inconsistent when combined with witness formulas (counterexample: psi=G(neg(p)), neg(psi)=F(p)). This blocks ALL bottom-up chain constructions across 12 plan versions and 16 research reports. The viable path is a top-down canonical model approach (worlds=MCSes, relation=GContent-inclusion, forward_F from step lemma, linearity from temp_a axiom).

artifacts.summary: Fixed misleading Phase 5/6 comment about forward_F
Marked forward_F/backward_P as [SORRY] in property list
Added DO NOT TRY list + 4 GContent/HContent monotonicity lemmas (0 sorries)
Implementation summary for v012 iteration (Phases 1-2 completed, Phase 3 blocked)

partial_progress.details: Phases 1-2 completed (documentation cleanup, GContent infrastructure). Phase 3 BLOCKED: omega-squared F-persistence gap is mathematically identical to the linear chain gap. All bottom-up chain constructions are blocked. Resolution requires canonical model approach.

errors.message: Omega-squared inner chain has same F-persistence issue as linear chain. FPreservingSeed + witness is provably inconsistent (counterexample exists). All bottom-up chain constructions blocked.
errors.recommendation: Implement canonical model approach: worlds=MCSes, R=GContent-inclusion, forward_F from step lemma, linearity from temp_a axiom, embedding into Int via countability. This is a different architecture from DovetailingChain.lean.

completion_data.completion_summary: Completed Phases 1-2 of plan v012: documentation cleanup (4 files updated with accurate warnings and DO NOT TRY lists) and GContent infrastructure (4 new monotonicity lemmas proven). Phase 3 (omega-squared construction) is mathematically blocked - the F-persistence gap exists at every level of chain nesting. Resolution requires a fundamentally different canonical model approach.

DovetailingChain.lean.note: forward_F/backward_P remain - mathematically blocked for all bottom-up chain constructions
